title: LOHA Excitedly Announces Exclusive Halloween Sale to get Extra $5 Off of their LOHA iPhone Lens and iPhone Tripod
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Now that Halloween is just around the corner, LOHA wastes no time to announce an exclusive Halloween sale for all their customers. With this Halloween sale, they can get $5 off of LOHA’s products, the iPhone Lens and iPhone Tripod using the coupon code "5OFFLOHA".
Halloween is but an exciting day not only to kids but even to adults as well. This time of the year is but a perfect day to take great photos with costumes, haunted houses as well as children doing trick or treats and more. This is definitely an exciting day for people who like to create exciting, fun memories and take picture of them. On that note, LOHA offers them with yet another exciting this Halloween and that is their Halloween sale where customers can get $5 off when they buy LOHA iPhone Lens and/or iPhone Tripod.
With these products, users are sure to take advantage of a much better Halloween pictures this season. First of all is the LOHA iPhone Lens which is excellent in enhancing user’s mobile photography. It comes in 2 in 1 camera lens able to increase the viewable area at about 30% in square, landscape, selfies, interior as well as exterior real shots. Furthermore, it comes with Macro 10 x lenses which enables for magnification of details thus photos can be captured from just 1 inch away.
On the other hand, the LOHA iPhone Tripod is a flexible cell phone accessory with legs that can bend as well as hold no matter what kind of object. It also comes with rubber feet which provide friction so that the phone is held securely even when placed on uneven surfaces. Additionally, this iPhone accessory can fit any kind of smartphone and every case. Thus, users will not have to worry that it will not work for them. The LOHA mount features a very innovative design with the use of spring loaded cell fastener as well as a screw lengthener. This way, it can fit not matter what kind of smartphone it may be, whether it is iPhone 3 or Galaxy Note.
Most users who have both these products are happy with how it all turned out. They both worked perfectly fine and they are great in enhancing their mobile photography. That being the case, now that LOHA offers them at discounted price, more people are surely pleased to the news. After all, they will definitely enjoy such products taking lots of picture for this Halloween.
